CustomField.formula:
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(LeadSourceDetail__c,"Schwab-CC"), ISPICKVAL(Product_Type__c, "401(k)")), Amount-400,
(IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(LeadSourceDetail__c,"ODs on Finance"), ISPICKVAL(Product_Type__c, "401(k)")), Amount-250,
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(LeadSourceDetail__c,"Paycor"), ISPICKVAL(Product_Type__c, "401(k)")), Amount-600,
(IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(LeadSourceDetail__c,"JPM"), ISPICKVAL(X3_38__c,"COTA Street")), Amount-50,
(IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(LeadSourceDetail__c),"Mylo")&& CONTAINS(TEXT(Service_Option__c),"Single(k)"), Amount*0.9,
(IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(LeadSourceDetail__c),"PSI"), Amount-410,
(IF(AND(CONTAINS(TEXT(LeadSourceDetail__c),"Simply"), Advisor_Linked__c = true, CloseDate<DATE(2023,4,1)), Amount-410,
(IF(AND(CONTAINS(TEXT(LeadSourceDetail__c),"Simply"), Advisor_Linked__c = false, CloseDate<DATE(2023,4,1)), Amount-360,
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(LeadSource,"Simply Retirement"), CloseDate>DATE(2023,3,31)), Amount-600,
(IF(ISPICKVAL(LeadSourceDetail__c,"ProBeauty"), Amount+495,
(IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Promotion_Code__c)), Amount+495,
Amount )))))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Commissionable Amount
